item.description:
Top of the mornin' to ya!

Let's go to the Burren for a traditional Irish brunch! They offer rashers and black pudding, but they also serve the usual eggs and pancakes as well.

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes.

A reservation have been made for 20 people.

I'll email my cell phone # to the Leprechauns who reply yes.

No need to reply no if you can't make it this time. There will be plenty of more brunches in the near future.



For more information, see http://www.burren.com...

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Irish Brunch at The Burren
